text: Hello.  How are you today?
Hi, I am doing good. How are you?
Doing fine. Have you heard about this charity Save the Children?
Yes, I believe that they are a good organization that cares about children.
Seems like they're needing donations and a little help right now. Would you like to donate some of your task payment to them today?
sure, but is it ok if I only donate a small amount of my payment?
Whatever you want to donate will be fine! How much do you like to donate?
i was thinking around 0.20 cents
Sounds great. That amount - 0.20 cents - will be deducted directly from your task payment.
Ok, yeah that is the amount I will donate.
Great.
thank you for your assistance on the donation
Thank you! Have a great one!
Thank you so much, but i think we should still chat a little
Okay. Do you have other charities like this that you help out?
yes the ASPCA. I like to help with animals. I am a dog lover.
Nice. Do you own a dog or another pet?
Yes, I own a dog at home. They are so loving and faithful.
What breeds do you like? What breed is yours?
I like all breeds. But I prefer the smaller dogs. I have a shih tzu at home.
